message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement today. I am offering the product to you for $11,500, which is a special introductory price. This opportunity won't last long, so let me know if this suits your budget.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm hoping to get it a bit lower.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget, I am now offering the product for $10,500. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope it meets your expectations.
